text: Zinedine Soualem (born 17 April 1957) is a French actor. He has appeared in at least five films directed by Cédric Klapisch. ==Personal life== Of Algerian origins, he was married to actress Hiam Abbass. They have two daughters, Lina and Mouna. ==Theatre== {| class="wikitable" ! Year ! Title ! Author ! Director !
